readable.title: 319938879_daf0857f91
readable.content: A man in a blue jacket is changing the performance information board of a theater . A man is using a large pole to remove letters from a sign . A man putting up letters on a sign with a long pole in front of a store . A person in a blue sweatshirt replaces letters in a theater marquee using a long pole . A theater worker changes the marquee outside a community theater .
